original_text: For the inhabitant of Maroth waited carefully for good: but evil came down from the Lord unto the gate of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 마롯 주민이 근심 중에 복을 바라니 이는 재앙이 여호와께로 말미암아 예루살렘 성문에 임함이니라

sentences.original_text: For inhabitant of Maroth waited carefully for good:
but evil came down from the Lord
